system.description:
Autocannons are large, fully automatic cannons that fire explosive shells instead of bullets. They can be mounted on vehicles or railers.

Autocannons are capable of burst fire and suppressive fire when used against vehicles. A direct hit from an autocannon shell would kill any character. However, characters are difficult to target with autocannons. Therefore, the Referee can treat an autocannon attack as an explosive (2d6+2 damage in 30' radius).
